theme: A raw, energetic, and intimate portrayal of a live heavy metal performance.
musicDescription: This is a high-energy heavy metal track with aggressive vocals, driving guitars, and powerful drumming. The song features a straightforward verse-chorus structure with a driving tempo. The music evokes feelings of defiance and intensity.
angles: ANGLE_1: Wide shot of the full stage, showcasing all band members and the overall stage setup with intense blue and purple stage lighting.
ANGLE_2: Tight close-up of the singer's face, capturing their intense expressions and performance.
ANGLE_3: Close-up of the guitar player's hands and guitar, highlighting their intricate playing.
ANGLE_4: Close-up of the drummer, focusing on their powerful drumming and dynamic movements.
ANGLE_5: Close-up of the bass player, showcasing their focused expression and rhythmic performance.
ANGLE_6: Wide shot of the crowd, capturing their energy and engagement with the band.
ANGLE_7: Stage side angle, capturing dramatic silhouettes of the band members against the stage lighting.
ANGLE_8: Low angle looking up at the singer, emphasizing their stage presence and power.
ANGLE_9: Behind the band, looking out at the crowd, providing a perspective of the band's view and the audience interaction.
